name: trip-bolzano-esn-trento
description: even" cxmmr5t8 oygrvhab hcukyx3x c1et5uql"are you ready for the first day-trip of your erasmus? let's start the welcome week with the right foot by discovering another beautiful city in the trentino region! cxmmr5t8 oygrvhab hcukyx3x c1et5uql"we will meet with our friends from esn bolzano and discover the city with them. cxmmr5t8 oygrvhab hcukyx3x c1et5uql"the train ticket is on behalf of the participants, no other fee! we will meet at the train station at 13:00 and catch the train at 13:30. as soon as we arrive, esn bolzano will show us around the town. afterwards, we'll have a snack/drink all together and be back in trento before the evening . nb: the event will be postponed in case of bad weather, we will keep you informed
